sections.name: Behavior
items: **Be respectful** to everyone. No insults, personal attacks, or harassment.
Keep language **clean and inclusive**. Slurs, hate speech, or discriminatory remarks are strictly **forbidden**.
Avoid **spam**: no excessive pings, repeated messages, or disruptive formatting.
Use **English** for public channels unless otherwise specified.

sections.name: Channels & Organization

sections.name: Enforcement
items: Moderators may issue **warnings**, **mutes**, **kicks**, or **bans** at their discretion.
Minor infractions typically receive a warning; repeated violations escalate.
Severe violations may result in immediate ban **without prior warning**.
Appeals can be submitted to staff; final decisions rest with the admin team.

sections.name: Compliance
items: By participating, you agree to the **[Discord Terms of Service](https://discord.com/terms)** and **[Community Guidelines](https://discord.com/guidelines)**.
If rules are unclear, ask staff for clarification before posting.
Rules may be updated; changes will be announced. **Stay informed.**
